# Markdown Site

# Markdown Cheat Sheet

markdownguide.orgopen in new window

# Edit Sites with Markdown

Check out this projekt with git@github.com:softceed/vue-decap-netlify.git

Edit .md files within the /docs directory

# VuePress

vuepress.vuejs.orgopen in new window

  • Edit Navigation in /.vuepress/config.ts
  • Style the Page in /.vuepress/styles/index.scss
  • Layout in /.vuepress/layouts/Layout.vue

# Use Vue Components

Just put some component in the md file

<ExampleComponent />

# Run Local Test

npm run docs:dev
